Label: Purpose
ID: To provide a unique alpha-numeric ID for the item that will act as the primary key in Solr and to create a unique landing page for the item.

Label: Entry Guidelines
ID: Enter a string of alpha-numeric characters separated by dashes. The ID must be globally unique across all institutions in your GeoBlacklight index.

Label: Commentary
ID: This field makes up the URL for the resource in GeoBlacklight. It is visible to the user and is used to create permalinks. If having a readable slug is desired, it is common to use the form institution-keyword1-keyword2.
